org.webcurator.core.report.parameter
Class DateParameter

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.report.parameter.DateParameter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Parameter
public class DateParameter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parameter

Parameter representing a Date.

The date format is by default set to European format dd/MM/yyyy.

Author:
MDubos
